So if an executive Agency tries to cheat on exposing itself to the  CRA process by not submitting the rule, a Member of Congress can go to  the GAO and say: Hey, what is up with this? Isn't this a rule?

And if GAO says it is a rule, then it is deemed submitted, and the  CRA process begins. That solves the under submission process.…
